DataElement.preferredName: Substance Abuse Psychological Personal Medical History Eligibility Determination Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no/unknown/not applicable indicator that describes whether or not a patient has a history of substance abuse and/or other psychological conditions.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Substance Abuse Psychological Personal Medical History Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Maladaptive pattern of drug or alcohol use that may lead to social, occupational, psychological, or physical problems._Having to do with how the mind works and how thoughts and feelings affect behavior._A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies._The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Substance Abuse Psychological Personal Medical History
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Maladaptive pattern of drug or alcohol use that may lead to social, occupational, psychological, or physical problems.:Having to do with how the mind works and how thoughts and feelings affect behavior.:A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Concepts.definition: Maladaptive pattern of drug or alcohol use that may lead to social, occupational, psychological, or physical problems.
Having to do with how the mind works and how thoughts and feelings affect behavior.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Property.preferredDefinition: Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does patient have a known his
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a known history of substance abuse or any other clinically significant medical conditions (i.e. psychological conditions) that may, in the opinion of the investigator, interfere with the clinical study?
